28.text: Hello. Tonight, we meet two more teams whom we fully expect

32.text: to have spent the last few weeks bonding, swotting

35.text: and avoiding cracks in the pavement

45.text: among the four highest-scoring losing teams

48.text: from these first-round matches, so crack on with it.

51.text: The University of Nottingham began life in the 19th century

54.text: as a constituent college of London University,

57.text: with its foundation stone laid by Gladstone in 1877.

61.text: In the 1920s, it moved from the city centre

63.text: to a campus on the outskirts of the city

66.text: following an endowment by Sir Jesse Boot of Boots The Chemist fame.

73.text: and alumni include the writer DH Lawrence,
